info.title: Document Integration API
info.description:
The Document Integration API provides a way to transfer documents between Abrigo and external document systems.

Finding Documents

When getting documents from Abrigo, you can filter by the uploaded date for more efficient retrieval.

GET /v1/documents?dateUploadedStartDate=2019-12-01&dateUploadedEndDate=2019-12-31

Get Documents from Abrigo

  1. Get the document metadata (ex: GET /v1/documents)
  2. Get the document folder details if needed using the document.documentFolderId property (GET /v1/document-folders/{documentFolderId})
  3. Get the base64 content of the document using the document.id property if needed (GET /v1/documents/{id}/content)
  4. Get items associated with the document (customers, loans, etc.) if needed (GET /v1/document-associations?documentId={id})
  5. Get additional data related to the associated items using the respective endpoints (customers, loans, collateral, etc.)

Authentication

Authentication for the API goes through Sageworks Auth, an identity provider application built using OAuth 2.0.

Overview of OAuth 2.0 Workflow for Private Clients
  1. Make a POST request to https://auth.sageworks.com/connect/token with client_id, client_secret, and grant_type specified in the body.
  2. Get the Bearer Token (access_token) from the response to your POST request.
  3. Use the Bearer Token in your API request, which will return a JSON response if successful.

More authentication details can be found at https://api.sageworks.com/documentation/AnalystApi.html

get.summary: Gets all customers

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of results to retrieve (first page = 1, default = 1)

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: The number of records to return on each page (minimum = 1, maximum = 1000, default = 200)

parameters.name: uniqueIdentifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier to filter by

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: List of ids to filter by

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Customer name to filter by

parameters.name: taxId
parameters.description: Tax ID to filter by

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Email to filter by

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: City to filter by

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: 2 character state code to filter by

parameters.name: includeUserDefinedFields
parameters.description: Include User Defined fields in the response

200.description: Gets all current, existing, and active customers in the account

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The customer to create

201.description:
The customer has been created successfully. The customer
            that was created is returned and has the Sageworks id that was assigned.

parameters.name: perPage

200.description: Gets basic information for all current, existing, and active customers in the account

get.summary: Search customers based on specific criteria

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of results to retrieve (first page = 1, default = 1)

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: The number of records to return on each page (minimum = 1, maximum = 1000, default = 200)

parameters.name: onlyCustomersWithFinancialRecords
parameters.description: Set to true to ensure the records return are linked to financial records

200.description: Gets basic information for all current, existing, and active customers that meet search criteria

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The collection of customers to create

200.description:
All customers were processed. Please check the errors property of the response object
            to determine if there were errors creating any individual customer

2.message: Input model for request is invalid

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The collection of customers to update

200.description:
All customers were processed. Please check the errors property of the response object
            to determine if there were errors updating any individual customer

get.summary: Gets all portfolio loans

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of results to retrieve (first page = 1, default = 1)

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: The number of records to return on each page (minimum = 1, maximum = 1000, default = 200)

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: CustomerId value to filter by

parameters.name: loanNumber
parameters.description: Loan Number to filter by

parameters.name: loanAmountStart
parameters.description: The start of the loan amount to be used when doing a loan amount range query. This amount is inclusive.

parameters.name: loanAmountEnd
parameters.description: The end of the loan amount to be used when doing a loan amount range query. This amount is inclusive.

parameters.name: paymentType
parameters.description: Payment Type for the loan

parameters.name: loanTermStart
parameters.description: The start of the loan term to be used when doing a loan term range query (# of periods determined by payment frequency).

parameters.name: loanTermEnd
parameters.description: The end of the loan term to be used when doing a loan term range query (# of periods determined by payment frequency).

parameters.name: indexRateDescription
parameters.description: Index Rate Description for the proposed loan

parameters.name: excludeLoansForDeletedCustomers
parameters.description: Set to true to ensure the proposed loans returned are not linked to deleted primary borrowers

parameters.name: includeUserDefinedFields
parameters.description: Include User Defined fields in the response

200.description: Gets all current, existing, and active portfolio loans in the account

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The portfolio loan to create

201.description:
The portfolio loan has been created successfully. The portfolio loan
            that was created is returned and has the Sageworks id that was assigned.

parameters.description:
The ID of the document to retrieve associations for.
Note: Use DocumentId to filter by a single document id. Use DocumentIds to filter by multiple document ids.

parameters.name: documentIds
parameters.description:
List of document ids to retrieve associations for.
Note: Use DocumentId to filter by a single document id. Use DocumentIds to filter by multiple document ids.

parameters.name: objectType
parameters.description: The type of object to retrieve associations for (ex: Customer, Collateral, PortfolioLoan, ProposedLoan, Workflow)

parameters.name: objectId

The id of the object to retrieve associations for.
Note: Use ObjectId to filter by a single object id. Use ObjectIds to filter by multiple object ids

parameters.name: objectIds

List of object ids to retrieve associations for.
Note: Use ObjectId to filter by a single object id. Use ObjectIds to filter by multiple object ids

BulkCreateRequest[Collateral].description:
Contains the input necessary to perform a request to create a collection of items
in a single request

BulkCreateRequest[Customer].description:
Contains the input necessary to perform a request to create a collection of items
in a single request

BulkCreateRequest[PortfolioLoan].description:
Contains the input necessary to perform a request to create a collection of items
in a single request

BulkCreateRequest[ProposedLoan].description:
Contains the input necessary to perform a request to create a collection of items
in a single request

BulkCreateResponse[Collateral].description: Contains the response of a bulk creation request

errors.description:
A dictionary of errors where the key of the dictionary is the index of the item in the list that
was provided in the request that had an error and the value is the error that occurred. If this collection is empty,
that means no errors occurred

itemsCreated.description:
A list of the items created in the same order that was provided in the request so that the index of the
item in the list can be used as a key to match up client side items with the server side items
and set the server generated properties (Id, etc.) 
            
Items that were unable to be created are returned as "null"

BulkCreateResponse[Customer].description: Contains the response of a bulk creation request

errors.description:

was provided in the request that had an error and the value is the error that occurred. If this collection is empty,

collateralMetadataType.description:
The type of this collateral. Ex: proposed, existing, archive, etc.
            
When creating a new collateral, field can only be set to proposed or existing. Value cannot be updated once it is set.

collateralType.description: The type of collateral (ex: equipment, land, etc.)

countyCode.description:
County Code for collateral location
Read only if Geocodio is enabled

currentValue.description: The current value of the collateral, this value is autocalculated and therefore ignored on POST and PATCH requests

customerId.description: Id of the customer that is pledging the collateral

dateAppraisalRequested.description: The date the appraisal was requested for this collateral

discountRate.description: Percentage used to "discount" or adjust the current value for this piece of collateral

floodDeterminationDate.description: Flood determination date of the collateral

govtContractDate.description: Govt Contract Date of the collateral

govtContractNumber.description: Govt Contract Number of the collateral

id.description: The id of the collateral in Sageworks

includeInProposedScenario.description: Include existing collateral in proposed scenario

isDeleted.description: Indicates if the collateral has been deleted

isForAgriculturalPurpose.description: Whether collateral is for agricultural purpose

isProtectedArea.description: Whether collateral is in a protected area

isReadyForAppraisal.description: Is this collateral ready for appraisal?

isSecondHome.description: Whether collateral is a second home

latitude.description:
Latitude of collateral location
Read only if Geocodio is enabled

letterOfCreditDate.description: Letter of Credit Date of the collateral

longitude.description:
Longitude of collateral location
Read only if Geocodio is enabled

manufacturedHomeLandPropertyInterest.description: Manufactured Home Land Property Interest of collateral

medianHouseholdIncome.description:
Median Household Income for collateral location
Read only if Geocodio is enabled

metropolitanDivision.description:
Metropolitan Division of collateral location
Read only if Geocodio is enabled

metropolitanDivisionCode.description:
Metropolitan Division Code of collateral location
Read only if Geocodio is enabled

metropolitanStatisticalArea.description:
Metropolitan Statistical Area for collateral location
Read only if Geocodio is enabled

mostRecentAppraisalDate.description: The date of the most recent appraisal for this collateral

mostRecentAppraisalValue.description: The value of the most recent appraisal for this collateral

multiFamilyAffordableUnits.description: Multi family affordable units of collateral

originalValue.description: The original value of the collateral

propertyTaxID.description: Property Tax ID of the collateral

specialFloodHazardArea.description: Indicates whether the collateral is in  a flood zone

stateCode.description:
State Code for collateral location
Read only if Geocodio is enabled

titledType.description: Indicates whether the collateral is titled

tractCode.description:
Tract Code for collateral location

addresses.description:
Addresses of the customer. The customer may have multiple addresses (ex: primary, mailing).
            
A primary address with a valid State is required for a Business, Farm, or NonProfit

ansoniaCreditRating.description: The rating is the average monthly balance and average Days Beyond Terms for the rating period (business only)

ansoniaRiskScore.description: Low Risk greater than 87, Medium Risk 70 - 87, High Risk less than 70 (business only)

averageCDs.description: The average amount of CDs over the last year

averageChecking.description: The average amount in checking accounts over the last year

averageSavings.description: The average amount in savings accounts over the last year

averageUnitRevenueGrowth.description: A transparency measure for new unit sales over time plus a comparative assessment of average unit revenues to peers and industry. Scoring Range (0-70) (business only)

avgInitial.description: Average cost of the project for a new franchisee (business only)

bankruptcies.description: Number of bankruptcies the customer has had (people only)

bankruptciesCount.description: Count of bankruptcies reported in the last 24 months (business only)

branch.description: Branch of the bank that is responsible for this customer

businessRegistered.description: The state where the business is registered (business only)

businessType.description: Type of business (ex: C Corporation, LLC, Partnership, etc.)

cDsBalance.description: The current balance of CDs for the customer

chargeOffsCount.description: Count of charge-offs reported in the last 24 months (business only)

checkingBalance.description: The current balance in the checking accounts

citizenshipStatus.description: Citizenship Status of the customer (people only)

cityHQ.description: City HQ of Franchise Brand (business only)

civDescription.description: Type of identification that the borrower is providing for an institution's customer identification verification (CIV) form (people only)

collectionsCount.description: Count of collections reported in the last 24 months (business only)

companyOwnedUnits.description: The Number of Company locations (business only)

compoundAnnualUnitGrowthRate.description: The trailing 3 year growth rate at the franchise unit level (business only)

compoundedUnitSuccessRate.description: Eight year Compounded Unit Success Rate based on past historical unit success rates in the Franchise Branding Underwriting Report Section (business only)

countyCode.description: County code of the customer's address

creditLogicScore.description: Ranging from 0 (high risk) to 100 (low risk), the Credit Logic Score is a predictive business credit indicator (business only)

crmIdentifier.description: The CRM identifier for this customer

currentAutoPastDue.description: The current dollar amount that is past due on all auto loans for the customer (people only)

currentEducationPastDue.description: The current dollar amount that is past due on all education loans for the customer (people only)

currentInstallmentPastDue.description: The current dollar amount that is past due on all installment loans for the customer (people only)

currentMortgagePastDue.description: The current dollar amount that is past due on all mortgage loans for the customer (people only)

currentOpenPastDue.description: The current dollar amount that is past due on all open loans for the customer (people only)

currentOtherPastDue.description: The current dollar amount that is past due on all other loans for the customer (people only)

currentRevolvingPastDue.description: The current dollar amount that is past due on all revolving loans for the customer (people only)

currentTotalPastDue.description: The current dollar amount that is past due on all loans for the customer (people only)

dataDepthScore.description: Indicates the volume of predictive data that is available on a company. Ranking from on a scale from 0-9, where 9 indicates the greatest level of predictive data with ALL three national bureaus reporting (business only)

dateBusinessEstablished.description: The date the business was established

dateOfBirth.description: Date of Birth for this customer (people only)

dateOfLastBankruptcy.description: Date of customer's last bankruptcy (people only)

dba.description: The name that the customer is "doing business as"

dbViabilityRating.description: Assessment of the probability that a company will no longer be in business within the next 12 months (business only)

department.description: Department of the bank that is responsible for this customer

employer.description: Name of person or organization that employs the customer (people only)

entryMethod.description: The Entry method for this business (business only)

equifaxCreditScoreDate.description: Customer's Equifax Credit Score Date Pulled

experianCreditScoreDate.description: Customer's Experian Credit Score Date Pulled

farmRegistered.description: The state where the farm is registered (farm only)

ficoSbssCreditScoreDate.description: Customer's FICO SBSS Principal Credit Score Date Pulled (people only)

finStatementStrength.description: A measure of a franchisor's financial/capital ability to support system growth. Scoring Range (0-50) (business only)

firstName.description: First name of the customer (people only)

franchiseAgreementAssessment.description: Identifies unusual control terms that affect the borrower and unusual control terms that affect the lender. Scoring Range (0-40) (business only)

franchiseDataFinancialPeriod.description: The financial year of Franchise Data used (business only)

franchisedUnits.description: The Number of Franchisee locations (business only)

franchiseeRelationship.description: Based on information from an independent franchisee satisfaction assessment. Scoring Range (0-40) (business only)

historical30DayDelinquencies.description: The total number of 30 day delinquencies listed on the customer's credit report (people only)

historical60DayDelinquencies.description: The total number of 60 day delinquencies listed on the customer's credit report (people only)

historical90DayDelinquencies.description: The total number of 90 day delinquencies listed on the customer's credit report (people only)

historicalOtherDelinquencies.description: The total number of delinquencies listed on the customer's credit report that exceed 90 days (people only)

historicalSuccessRate.description: Assesses the overall health of a franchise system (business only)

id.description: The id of the customer in Sageworks

idDescription.description: Description for the type of identification presented to the financial institution, such as a state issued driver's license or a passport (people only)

idExpirationDate.description: This is the expiration date of the customer's identification (people only)

idIssueDate.description: This is the date on which the authoritative entity issued the customer's identification (people only)

idIssuingAuthority.description: This is the name or a description of the authoritative entity who has issued the customer's identification (people only)

idNumber.description: This is the description of unique information(such as mothers' maiden name or high school mascot) provided to the financial institution by the customer (people only)

idState.description: This is the state of the customer's identification (people only)

industryCode.description: The NAICS code related to the customer. This field is required for a Business or Farm

isActiveMiltaryDuty.description: Whether the customer is currently on active military duty (people only)

isDeleted.description: Indicates if this customer has been deleted

isDependentOfActiveMiltaryDuty.description: Whether the customer is a dependent of someone currently on active military duty (people only)

isMailingAddressDifferent.description: Whether the mailing address is different than the primary address

judgmentsCount.description: Count of judgments reported in the last 24 months (business only)

lastName.description: Last name of the customer (people only)

lastReportRun.description: Date last business credit report was run (business only)

liensCount.description: Count of liens reported in the last 24 months (business only)

loanBoardingIdentifier.description: The identifier used for loan boarding for this customer

loanOfficerId.description: Id of the customer's loan officer

maritalStatus.description: Marital Status of the customer (people only)

maxInitial.description: Maximum cost of the project for a new franchisee (business only)

medianHouseholdIncome.description: Median Household Income of the area where customer's address is located

metropolitanDivision.description: Metropolitan Division of the customer's address

metropolitanDivisionCode.description: Metropolitan division code of the customer's address

middleInitial.description: Middle initial of the customer (people only)

minInitial.description: Minimum cost of the project for a new franchisee (business only)

mngmtExperienceStability.description: Measures the stability and level of experience of an executive team (business only)

msa.description: Metropolitan statistical area of the customer's address

namePrefix.description: Prefix of the customer's name (ex: Mr, Mrs, Dr, etc.)

nameSuffix.description: Suffix of the Customer's name (Jr, Sr, etc) (people only)

nsfChecksCount.description: Count of NSF checks reported in the last 24 months (business only)

numberOfYearsEmployed.description: Number of years the customer has worked for the person or organization that employs them (people only)

ofacDesignation.description: OFAC designation for this customer (Positive, Negative)

phoneNumbers.description: Phone numbers of the customer. The customer may have multiple phone numbers (ex: primary, mobile, fax)

professionalLLC.description: This indicates whether or not the limited liability entity is a professional limited liability company (business only)

projectedOpenings.description: Projected Franchised Unit Openings for the next year (business only)

projectedUnitSuccess.description: Adjusts the Historical Unit Success Rate based on brand, peer and industry trend analysis. Scoring Range (0-250) (business only)

prospectScreening.description: Metric that gauges franchisor selection practices when screening franchise applicants. Scoring Range (0-40) (business only)

recurringRevenueSelfSufficiency.description: A standard that measures whether a franchisor can cover operating expenses from ongoing revenue without having to rely on expanding the franchised system size. Scoring Range (0-50) (business only)

resaleActivityLevel.description: Level of transfer activity a system goes through (business only)

restricted.description: Indicates if the customer is restricted

savingsBalance.description: The current balance in the savings accounts

secondaryCreditScore.description: Secondary credit score of the customer

stateCode.description: State code of the customer's address

stateHQ.description: State HQ of Franchise Brand (business only)

stateOfFormation.description: The state in which the business was incorporated (business only)

systemSupportAndExpenseCommitment.description: Metric for determining the types of support the franchisor provides to its franchises (business only)

totalFundScore.description: Overall Franchise score. Scoring Range (0-950) (business only)

tractCode.description: Tract code of the customer's address

transunionCreditScoreDate.description: Customer's Equifax Credit Score Date Pulled

type.description: Type of customer (business, person, farm, etc.)

underFormation.description: Indicates if the business is under formation (business only)

uniqueIdentifier.description: Something that uniquely identifies this customer (usually a "customer number" or tax id from the core system)

unitEconomics.description: Level of transparency which affects whether the amount of information a franchisor discloses allows a franchisee to estimate their unit's potential financial performance and profitability. Scoring Range (0-100) (business only)

yearFounded.description: The year in which the business was formed (business only)

CustomerId to associate document with when creating a document in a Customer folder. Not allowed to be specified on documents that are not created in a customer folder

borrowerName.description: This is the name of the primary borrower

currentBalance.description: This is the current outstanding amount on the loan prior to any charge-offs and other adjustments

daysCurrentlyPastDue.description: Number of days a payment has not been made

id.description: The id of the loan in Sageworks

loanNumber.description:
Loan number assigned to the loan. This is also the unique identifier of the loan
in the source system

loanOfficer.description: This is the name of the loan officer assigned

maturityDate.description: The date when loan the must be paid to the investor

originalBalance.description: This is the original amount of credit that was approved

paymentAmount.description: The payment amount for the loan. For fixed principal and fixed payment loans, this will include principal and interest. For lines of credit, this will include interest only.

paymentFrequency.description: The frequency of the payments for the loan (ex: weekly, monthly, annual, etc.)

type.description: The type of phone number (ex: primary, mobile, fax)

PortfolioLoan.description: A loan to a customer of a financial institution

accountType.description: The level of the loan in the hierarchy.  For example, these could be a facility, limit, loan.

accruedInterest.description:
Interest that has accumulated since the principal investment,
or since the previous interest payment if there has been one already.
For purposes of the calculation of reserves for individually analyzed loans, the accrued interest
should be included in the Total Recorded Investment in the loan

adjustableInterestRate.description: Indicates if the interest rate for the loan is adjustable

amortizedOver.description: The term in which the loan payment is calculated

annualFee.description: Annual fees associated with this loan

bankCodeBranch.description: The Branch Code corresponding to the Bank Code Branch for the proposed loan

bookBalance.description: This is the balance of the loan after accounting for charge-offs and other adjustments to the current outstanding loan balance.

callCode.description: Code taken from the Report of Condition Schedule RC-C

ceilingRate.description: Maximum rate that can be charged for an adjustable rate loan

chargedOffAmount.description: The amount of principal balance that has been charged off for this loan

collateralCode.description: Code to identify the primary type of collateral associated with the loan

currentAvailableCredit.description: Current amount of available credit on the loan

currentBalance.description: This is the current outstanding amount on the loan prior to any charge-offs and other adjustments

dayCountConvention.description: Amortization Days are used to calculate the interest and payment amount for the life of the loan.

daysCurrentlyPastDue.description: Then number of days that the loan is currently past due

defaultStartDate.description: The date at which the loan went into default

expectedUtilizationRate.description: The percentage of the Line of Credit the borrower is expected to use

floorRate.description: Rate in the lower range of rates associated with a floating rate loan

governmentGuaranteed.description: Indicates if the loan is backed by government guarantees

id.description: The id of the loan in Sageworks

indexRateDescription.description: The floating rate that this loan is pegged to

industryCode.description: Industry code (NAICS) associated with the business if the borrower for this loan is a business

institutionWithheld.description: The amount of the loan that is not available to the borrower to draw (specific to this institution)

isGuidanceLineOfCredit.description: Whether the loan is a guidance line of credit

latestPaymentDate.description: The date of the most recent payment made on the loan

loanNumber.description:
Loan number assigned to the loan. This is also the unique identifier of the loan
in the source system

loanOfficerId.description: if of the loan officer for this loan

loanToValueRatio.description: The loan to value (LTV) ratio for the loan

loanTypeCode.description: A code to represent the primary type of the loan (ex: CRE, C/I, etc.)

lossGivenDefaultRiskRating.description: The loss given default risk rating

maturityDate.description: The date that the loan will expire / mature

netDeferredFeesOrCosts.description:
Net deferred loan fees or costs are certain fees and other direct costs associated with originating
loans over the life of the loan as an adjustment of yield, net of any related fees received.
For purposes of the calculation of reserves for individually analyzed loans, net deferred loan fees or
costs should be included in the Total Recorded Investment in the loan

overheadExpenses.description: Overhead fees associated with this loan

statusChangedByUsersID.description: User that last changed the status - read only

statusReason.description: Reason for the Declined/Withdrawn status - READ ONLY

termBeforeSecondaryRate.description: The Loan Term Before Secondary Rate

unusedCommitmentFee.description: Unused commitment fee associated with this loan

upfrontFee.description: Any upfront fees associated with the loan

userDefinedFields.description: User-defined fields for the proposed loan

withheldAmount.description: The amount of the loan that is not available to the borrower to draw

ProposedLoanBasicInformation.description: A proposed loan with just the basic information

customerId.description: The id of the customer that is the primary borrower for the proposed loan

id.description: The id of the proposed loan in Sageworks

loanAmount.description: This is the amount of the proposed loan

loanName.description: A descriptor that will help identify the loan

ProposedLoanExposure.description: Loan Exposure information for Proposed Loans

currentAvailableCredit.description: This field indicates the amount of credit that has been approved, but has not yet been used.

currentOutstandingBalance.description: The amount of the loan that still needs to be paid.

customerId.description: The id of the customer that is the primary borrower for the loan

totalCommitment.description: This is the sum of the Current Outstanding Balance and the Current Available Credit.

totalRelatedCommitment.description: This is the sum of the Total Commitment and the amount liable from all related loans. Related loans are portfolio loans where the customer is a co-borrower or guarantor. The amount liable is calculated by multiplying the loan's total commitment with the guarantor or co-borrower percentage.

ProposedLoanStatusUpdate.description: Updates to a proposed loans status

decisionReasons.description: The list of reasons the loan was denied or withdrawn

denialWithdrawalReason.description: The reason the loan was denied or withdrawn

denialWithdrawalType.description: The type of loan being denied or withdrawn

status.description: The status to which the proposed loan should be updated

statusReason.description: The reason for the status update

ProposedLoanStatusUpdates.description:
An object containing the info to perform multiple proposed loan status updates, optionally
including workflow details for notification processing

statusUpdates.description: List of status updates to perform

workflowPhaseId.description: Final approval phase ID the status updates correspond to

ProposedLoanSummaryInformation.description: A portfolio loan with just the summary information used on Loan Information page

borrowerName.description: This is the name of the primary borrower.

customerId.description: The id of the customer that is the primary borrower for the loan

id.description: The id of the loan in Sageworks

importedDate.description: Date the loan was imported. Null if it has not been imported.

loanAmount.description: This is the current outstanding amount on the loan prior to any charge-offs and other adjustments

loanName.description: This is the unique identifier of the proposed loan.

loanStage.description: This is the current stage in the proposed loan process this loan is in.

paymentType.description: This is the method with which the loan's payments are calculated (fixed payment, line of credit, etc.)

riskRating.description: This is the bank's calculated risk rating for the loan

status.description: This is the current status of the proposed loan: Approved, Declined, Withdrawn, etc.

RefinanceScenarioRequest.description: Request for creating a new Refinance Scenario

financialStatementId.description: The Id of the financial statement

loanName.description: The name/description of the proposed loan to create

proposedLoanId.description: The id of the proposed loan in Sageworks
